patterns: Can you give me some advice?
Can you tell me a quote?
responses: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

responses: Sure, how can I help you?
Absolutely, What can I do for you?
Sure, What's your problem?
Okay,What do you need?
Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony.
A lonely day is God’s way of saying that he wants to spend some quality time with you.
The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.

What’s the difference between England and a tea bag?
 The tea bag stays in the cup longer.

Why did the chicken commit suicide?
 To get to the other side.
